title: Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: K 9/30/33; lower right: SCALE 1"=1'0"/7493 [circled]; lower right in red color pencil: P; dimensions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing of long horizontal sideboard. Top iin darker material (Bakelite?), body in lighter wood with three (?) stacked horizontal drawers at center; four low, straight and squared legs in darker material. Front and back legs connected through three horizontal bands on body of sideboard near bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933.
September 30, 1933. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-914.
